BBDP1.A.DE.N.EPG.G.GP09SA000000.I10.L: Index of producer prices of industrial products sold on the domestic market / Germany / Unadjusted figure / Total

Methodology: Western Germany up to 1994 (up to 1959 excluding Saarland and up to 1960 excluding West Berlin), afterwards Germany (linked over January 1995; Bundesbank calculation). Figure for 1948: 2nd half of the year. Up to 1967 including turnover tax. As of 1968 without VAT.
